Portal 2 is one of my favorite games its funny and entertaining from start to finish has some decently difficult but rewarding puzzles and should be included in the orange box if your a fan of portal 1 and are thinking about buying portal 2 you really should portal 2 has more content a better story (in my opinion) and has graphical improvements over the first the game is about 6 hours long and is enjoyable start to finish.

En general es bueno pero cansa, muy rapido y se vuelve un poco repetitivo hacia la mitad del juego. Terminé jugando con un video de como pasar los puzzles y con ayuda de un amigo porque queria simplemente pasarme el juego, pero no lo terminé gozando tanto como el primero, porque no era una experiencia tan corta y fresca.

Sin embargo el juego mejora muchisimas cosas en cuanto a graficos, gameplay y amplia muchisimo la historia. lo mejor de todo es que ahora el modelo de Chell no da sida :D

Man I'm genuinely surprised. I never thought I'd enjoy a puzzle game. Portal 1 proved me wrong. But it was a short game and I was sure that if it was any longer I wouldn't have enjoyed it as much as I did. Portal 2 was way longer with a lot more complicated puzzles so it obviously scared me. And once again I was wrong. Both of the Portal games are incredibly fun. Even if I suck at them I still had tons of fun.

+The game looks beautiful, sounds great and plays really well.
+I love the characters. The voice acting, their personalities, the things they say and do. Its all perfect.
+Just like the first game really short loading times. It can get a bit annoying if you keep dying like i do but otherwise its not bad.
+The puzzles get a lot more complicated and we have a lot of new tools we can use to solve these puzzles.
+The game is a lot longer then the first one.
+From the start to the finish its all just a lot of fun. What else do you want from a game ?
+Co-op game mode ! You can play with your friends.

-The loading scenes can ruin some of the adrenaline and the fun, excitement of some scenes. Fortunately just like the first game the loading screens are short. And just like the first game there is a lot of them.

Even if you hate puzzles games you should still try out the Portal series. I recommend buying the Portal bundle this way you'll get both Portal 1 and 2. Both of them are great games. Obviously don't jump into Portal 2 without finishing Portal 1.
best game ever
oooooooooooooooooooooooo

Portal Two is a intricate game full of confusing puzzles and gripping story line.I really enjoy this game as it begins with simple puzzles that lure your into false sense of security as when your get further on the puzzles become mind-bogginly confusing and difficult.
This game is far from repetitive which was unexpected as I thought it would just be placung portals down but the amount of content and new things that come at you from every angle is Excellent!
Also the emotional connection you end up feeling towards the small amount of characters in this game is nothing like I've ever experienced before.
This game is awesome 10/10 would recommend.

Сыграл лишь сейчас впервые, так уж вышло.
Первую часть недавно за 5 часов прошёл, тут вышло дольше. И так даже лучше.
Ниже люди сравнивают, и говорят что первая часть лучше, но мне понравилась вторая больше.
Интересные новые механики (Жидкости дающие скорость, прыжки и так далее), намного много больше диалогов и сюжета в целом, отчего это играется также интересно.
Первая часть тоже порадовала и нравилась, но там в бОльшей степени были только загадки, и лишь крупицы сюжета, а тут наоборот, и мне так по душе.
Обе части очень хороши, и обязательно стоят внимания. Я хоть и сыграл в это лишь сейчас, но главное что наконец-то смог это сделать.
Игра хороша.
Интересные загадки, сюжет, персонажи, юмор и прочее.
Минусов не заметил, залпом проходил обе части сразу.

Обе части порадовали красивыми песнями в конце, местами было даже трогательно, и видно, что игру делали реально с душой.

Если вы такой, что будущие не должно начинаться с вас вернитесь в свое племя и приведите кого-то более умного. Итак перед вами произведение искусства, теперь после полного прохождения игры вы знаете как выглядит настоящее искусство. И с вашим новопреобретёными знаниями вы можете возродить человечество.

EDIT: Apparently people say this game takes like eight hours to complete, so I guess don't necessarily take my below comments as seriously. But then again, I listened to all the dialogue and generally didn't have that many difficulties with the puzzles...maybe it took so long because I didn't use walkthroughs until like chapter 8? Idk, but YMMV nonetheless

I really liked Portal 2, but have some comments for people who might be considering playing now.
Firstly, I loved the story and the dialogue and the levels were pretty solvable, though a couple near the end are really tricky. I have bad coordination, which made some 'boss' fights really finicky, however I found after like the fourth or fifth time dying I suddenly could get past the one block that was killing my time--whether that's the game adapting to my terrible gameplay or just me practicing enough, if you are like me and at the fifth time dying are about ready to give up, just know that you will get it! (Even if you need walkthroughs at times). I would replay this game though for the dialogue alone.
Saying that, as someone with ADHD, and whose playthrough was double the time it took to complete Portal, I have realized that my personal limit for story-based games is about 8 hours. I hyperfocus on the game, and the characters are so compelling I just want to play right through, which, I mean, you can do for fifteen hours straight, but it's not really well-advised. I did spread it out over like two or three days, but for those who get really swept up in the story and hyperfocus, just set some limits playing this game!
